gc.pmb_library.android.internal.manager
Class QuietTimeManager

java.lang.Object
  gc.pmb_library.android.internal.manager.QuietTimeManager

public class QuietTimeManager
extends java.lang.Object

The Class QuietTimeManager provides the methods for set,get and delete the QuietTime for a specified device on the PushMeBaby Server.

Author:
Carsten Fasold
Copyright 2012 GrandCentrix GmbH.
All rights reserved.
